ui.heroTitle: Full Stack & AI Engineer based in Hanoi
ui.heroDescription: I'm Le Quang Sang, a 24-year-old full stack and AI engineer based, passionate about building web/mobile products, shipping AI features and refining UX for international teams.
ui.experienceHeading: 4+ years shipping healthcare, social & AI products
ui.experienceIntro: From full stack delivery to computer vision R&D, I optimise for reliability, security and growth while collaborating closely with product & marketing stakeholders.
ui.skillsHeading: Flexible stack across Web, Mobile, AI & DevOps
ui.skillsIntro: Clean code, CI/CD discipline and pragmatic testing ensure every build is scalable and maintainable.
ui.educationHeading: B.Eng in Computer Science – AI & Computer Vision
ui.educationIntro: Electric Power University (2019 – 2024), GPA 3.61. Researched OCR, visual search and community-focused products.
ui.calloutDescription: I enjoy partnering with founders and product leads who value fast feedback loops, measurable outcomes and transparent communication.
ui.calloutInterests: I read one book every month and run three times a week to stay sharp and disciplined when driving delivery.
ui.schemaDescription: Full Stack and AI engineer with experience at Zotek8 and Torus Engineering, open to global web, mobile and AI collaborations.
